name: Outrigger Laguna Phuket Resort & Villas

reviews.text: This place is BEAUTIFUL!! First trip to Phuket and was glad we picked the Outrigger Laguna!
reviews.title: AMAZING!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The people are lovely, the place is beautiful, the villa was amazing!
reviews.title: Quiet and secluded getaway great for couples .........

reviews.text: I took my mother and mother in law on a girls weekend. We originally were going to book the 3 bedroom villa, however decided against it. We weren't disappointed with the 2 bedroom villa at all! This was HUGE! So much bigger than any 2 bedroom villa i have ever seen.
reviews.title: Great villas, ideal for relaxing family holiday

reviews.text: Villa was very clean. The staff at the hotel also couldnt do enough for you. Breakfast great also.
reviews.title: lovely, caring staff !

reviews.text: Great complex too... The Laguna area is great and offered alot of different things to do.
reviews.title: Very very good

reviews.text: We Stayed at the at the Outrigger Laguna for a week in August. We hired a car from the airport which we think is essential for Phuket and the Laguna resort. The Signage to the hotel when you get to Cherntalay is not very clear and we had to ask directions on the Laguna resort it self.
reviews.title: Lovely Resort

reviews.text: Check in was quick and easy and despite arriving early our villa was ready. The 2 bedroom villa was lovely, very well decorated and the furnishings were of a very high standard. The cleaner came in twice a day, so the villa was spotless. Breakfast was delivered the night before and there was plenty of it , fresh fruit, pastries, bread and cereal.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: We ate at Bites for lunch and the food was very good , prices were on a par with what you paid at home. The resort offers a shuttle bus to the Laguna beach resort but as we had a car we didn't use it . The staff at the resort were really helpful and very friendly and attentive.
reviews.title: Great villas in somewhat of a tourist trap

reviews.text: There are off site supermarkets if you can go to the Tesco lotus which is not too far, the Chubba shops are overpriced.
reviews.title: Second time this year

reviews.text: The nice thing about Outrigger is that it is very peaceful, we visited the laguna resorts and were so grateful to get back to Outrigger , they were very busy.
reviews.title: A great value option for our 5 week Summer holiday

reviews.text: We usually stay at famous brands/chain hotels when we travel, but we decided to stay at Outrigger this time after seeing all the good comments here and also the fact that they offer 4-bedroom villas, which are not often available at other chain hotels.
reviews.title: Wasn't impressed

reviews.text: Our 4-bedroom villas had a private pool, which was nice. But the villa itself was not that impressive. They used unknown brand shampoo/shower gel which was not of good quality....we ended up having to buy our own. All the items inside the villa seemed cheap, including bath robe and slippers. The shower water gets super hot and then super cold and big and small at random intervals...which made taking showers really uncomfortable. Bedsheets were not changed once for the 4 days that we stayed there.
reviews.title: Really well appointed villas

reviews.text: Service wise, housekeeping and inroom dining are good. But other services are VERY slow...like calling for buggy and getting extra towels etc (average wait time 45 minutes). The breakfast is delivered to your room the night before, which is fine....but it is the exact same things every day, and they had no fresh coffee (only instant coffee powder).
reviews.title: A great getaway

reviews.text: This resort is also quite far from everywhere and there's nothing to do inside the resort itself. I think this resort is good if you are on a budget and would like to stay at a private villa, but Outrigger is far far from the standards of other more established brandname hotels like Marriot or Sheraton. If I had known before the vast difference in quality and services I would definitely pay abit more and stay somewhere else.
reviews.title: A fantastic holiday, we ARE going back!

reviews.text: As a family with 4 young children, standard hotels just don;t work for us. We chose this hotel to meet up with another family. We rented a 3 bedroom and the other family had a 4 bedroom.
reviews.title: Excellent value for relaxed family holidays.

reviews.text: I was a little unsure when our travel agent suggested Outrigger. It appeared to not have been open for long and I couldn't find that many reviews. However, all of those that I could find were positive. Spent 10 nights there in early June with my wife and three kids (13,8,3).
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: Initial reaction from the family was very positive. We hadn't told the kids what sort of accomodation we were staying in and they (and us) were blown away by the size of the 3 bedroom villa and even more excited when they saw the lap pool.
reviews.title: Fun, friendly and relaxing.

reviews.text: My wife loved this place as it was so clean. There was daily servicing so that each afternoon or evening when we got home the place was clean and she had not had to do anything! Also, each evening there was a turn down service - a nice touch with an orchid on the pillow.
reviews.title: Truely Magical

reviews.text: The bedrooms consisted of (1) a main room with a massive walk in robe and massive ensuite (2) double bed - the teenager took this over and loved it and (3) twin single beds for the younger kids.
reviews.title: Incredible value!!!

reviews.text: The living area (lounge and dining) was very spacious and very comfortable. The kitchen was again MASSIVE and was fairly well appointed with implements - my wife was very happy not to use it for cooking during the time of our visit. There was a washing machine outside and we found that the clothes dried quickly particularly if you hung them in front of the vents from the airconditionsing units outside.
reviews.title: Lush hotel next to one of the best beaches in Phuket!

aka: Outrigger Laguna Phuket Resort & Villas Hotel
description: Outrigger Laguna Phuket Resort and Villas are new residential-style luxury suites and villas situated in Laguna Phuket, Asia's finest resort destination.Beautifully appointed 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom suites, as well as 2-bedroom, 3-bedroom, and 4-bedroom villas offer up to 604 square metres (6,501 square feet) of comfort in a modern expression of traditional Thai design. All villas are split-level with kitchen, dining and living areas on the lower floor. Suites are designed as modern-chic spaces to echo the sand and sea. Calm lagoon and garden views, lap pools, and personal Thai sala pavilions enhance the private ambience. 24-hour butler service is available. These villas are a splendid Phuket hotel option.The resort community of Laguna Phuket encompasses 1,000 acres of landscaped parks and meandering lagoons along the pristine, 8-kilometre Bang Tao Beach. 5 renowned spas, 18-hole Laguna Phuket Golf Club, 30 restaurants and bars, the Canal Shopping Village, kids’ clubs, Layan Beach Club - available for use by Outrigger guests only - and outdoor recreational activities for all ages make this a desirable destination for leisure enthusiasts, business travelers, and corporate meetings seeking a Phuket holiday experience. The lakeside wedding chapel is a highlight of this Phuket resort, offering a uniquely romantic setting to exchange vows.Experience poolside al fresco and indoor dining at the new Panache restaurant. Discover innovative Asian and international cuisine emphasizing casual, creative, and healthy preparations. The restaurant offers a delightful spin on made-to-order with an "interactive kitchen" where chefs prepare dishes to a customer's particular preference. Enjoy a variety of favorite European and Asian dishes such as specialty pizzas baked in a wood-fired oven, signature "Knock-Out Noodles" prepared your way, dim sum, satays, Thai curries, classic pepper steak flambe, and much more, accompanied by a wide range of desserts, wines, and healthy fruit drinks.
